sentences.en: a nursery for infants under two
sentences.cn: 两岁以下婴幼儿的托儿所

sentences.en: Anne made the beds and tidied up the nursery.
sentences.cn: 安妮把床铺都整理好，然后把幼儿室收拾停当。

sentences.en: He has painted murals in his children's nursery.
sentences.cn: 他在孩子们的儿童房墙壁上画上了画。

sentences.en: Her company ran its own workplace nursery.
sentences.cn: 她的公司开办了内部的托儿所。

sentences.en: Her youngest child is at nursery now.
sentences.cn: 她最小的孩子现在上托儿所。

sentences.en: I'm going to the nursery / nurseries in Hampton to buy some plants.
sentences.cn: 我准备到汉普敦的苗圃去买些花草.

sentences.en: If not a large concern, Queensbury Nursery was at least a successful one.
sentences.cn: 即使规模不算大，昆斯伯里托儿所至少办得很成功。

sentences.en: Not all nursery schools make use of the opportunities open to them.
sentences.cn: 并不是所有的托儿所都能抓住他们面临的机会。

sentences.en: She lapsed into a little girl voice to deliver a nursery rhyme.
sentences.cn: 她改用童声唱起童谣来。

sentences.en: She puts her baby in this nursery and then goes back to work.
sentences.cn: 她把孩子送到这家托儿所然后回去上班。

sentences.en: She will talk on the issues she cares passionately about including education and nursery care.
sentences.cn: 她将会谈一些自己十分感兴趣的话题，包括教育和幼儿护理。

sentences.en: The availability of nursery school places varies widely across London.
sentences.cn: 伦敦幼儿园的分布非常不均衡。

sentences.en: The garden, developed over the past 35 years, includes a nursery.
sentences.cn: 这个有35年历史的花园里有一个苗圃。

sentences.en: The nursery is bright and cheerful, with plenty of toys.
sentences.cn: 托儿所明亮宜人，还有许多玩具。

sentences.en: We had to rear it in a nursery and plant it out.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不在苗棚里培育它,然后再把它移植出来.

sentences.en: We have started a campaign for better nursery and school services.
sentences.cn: 我们已发起一场要求改善幼儿园和中小学教育服务的运动。

trans.tran_cn: 托儿所，幼儿园，育儿室，苗圃
trans.tran_en: a place where young children are taken care of during the day while their parents are at work
